documentation.text:
@notice token name
 @return string token name

@notice token symbol
 @return string symbol. The Token Symbol

@notice the total number of decimals for the BRN token
 @return uint number of decimals

@notice the total token supply in circulation
 @return uint total supply

@notice should return the address of the contract owner
 @return address the owner address specified in the Ownable contract
-- INTERNAL FUNCTIONS --

@notice token name
 @return string token name

@notice token symbol
 @return string symbol. The Token Symbol

@notice the total number of decimals for the BRN token
 @return uint number of decimals

@notice the total token supply in circulation
 @return uint total supply

@notice should return the address of the contract owner
 @return address the owner address specified in the Ownable contract
-- INTERNAL FUNCTIONS --

allowance(address,address).details: both the owner and spender addresses should not be empty addresse address(0)

returns._0: uint, the amount approved for spending

approve(address,uint256).details: the spender address should not be an empty address(0)the amount to be approved should not be less than the sender's balance

params._amount: uint , the amount to approved by the token holder

balanceOf(address).details: the account should not be the zero address , address(0)

params.account: account the address to which we want to determine their token balance

returns._0: uint the total balance of the specied address
address the owner address specified in the Ownable contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transfer(address,uint256).details: the recipient address should not be an empty address address(0)the sender's total balance must be equal to or greater than the amount specifiedthe nonReentrant modifier protects this function from reentrancy attacks

params.amount: uint the amount of tokens to be sent to the specied address as the recepient
params.recipient: address the person receiving the tokens

returns._0: bool success if the transfer was successfull otherwise false

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: both the sender and recipient address should not be the empty address, address(0)the amount of tokens being moved from the sender to the recipient address should not be less than the sender's total balancesthe nonReentrant modifier protects this function from reentrancy attacks

returns._0: true if the transfer event was successfull

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allowance(address,address).notice: returns the amount that owner appoved as allowance for the spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: enables the token holder to add a new address than can spend the tokens on their behalf

balanceOf(address).notice: how much token balance does this address have

decimals().notice: the total number of decimals for the BRN token

getOwner().notice: should return the address of the contract owner

totalSupply().notice: the total token supply in circulation

transfer(address,uint256).notice: transfer a specicied amount pf tokens to a recipient address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer the specidied amount of tokens from the sender address to the recipient address
